name: Catlien
description:
Tells the story of an extraterrestrial cat who is catching fish to fulfill his food needs. But while catching fish, a flock of birds got in the way. Catch as many fish as possible and avoid flying birds.

Game Play

  • Arrow Up, Right, Bottom, Left to Move.
  • Space to catch fish.

Note: Catch as many fish as you can to increase your score and avoid flocks of birds.

Our Team

  1. Lila_Smile (Art Design)
  2. Auxtern (Programmer)
